ovdesc.p: The file AA.INTEREST.ACCRUALS holds the interest accrual information for an arrangement for a given interest property.

This live file stores the interest rate, number of days, principal balance, basis used for a given period and the accrual amount. The fields showing the above information are associated. A new set of multivalues is formed for every change interest rate, basis, balance and period. If there is no change in any of the above said parameters, a new set is shown for every month.
These details would be updated during simulation for enquiry purposes.
